rules_text:
First strike, vigilance
[i]Chart the Stars[/i] – Whenever Owain, Star Charter attacks, create two Map tokens, then he explores. [i](They're artifacts with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Owain deals combat damage to a player, discover 3.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {W}{B}
